title: A Writer Moves To 'Bettyville' To Care For His Elderly Mom
teaser: In 2011, George Hodgman visited his mother Betty for her 91st birthday in Paris, Missouri. When he saw she needed care, he left Manhattan to live with her. But she still hasn't accepted that he's gay.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
